attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
tax breaks not increase's you will destroy the meaning of work and social family values. Thats if you the labour government havn;t already done that.
Bring back the good old family traditions to many stealth taxes we are all fed up with paying for everyones mistakes if you can;t run a company or a government you should probably consider changing your careers. This government has caused nothing but financial deprivation over the last couple of years, due to its failing of monetary failures. So that leaves the government accoutable in my eyes.
